parameters.responseBody:
=<html>
<head>
	<meta charset="utf-8">
	<meta http-equiv="X-UA-Compatible" content="IE=edge">
	<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1">

	<!-- Latest compiled and minified CSS -->
	<link rel="stylesheet" href="css/app.css">
	<script
		src="{{ $env.WEBHOOK_URL }}"
		integrity="sha256-H+K7U5CnXl1h5ywQfKtSj8PCmoN9aaq30gDh27Xc0jk="
		crossorigin="anonymous"></script>

	<title>Task View</title>
</head>
<body class="container-fluid">
{{$json.taskHtml}}
</body>
</html>

nodes.name: Workflow Documentation 2

parameters.content:
# Bitrix24 Task Form Widget Application Workflow example with Webhook Integration

## Overview
Automated workflow: Bitrix24 Task Form Widget Application Workflow example with Webhook Integration. This workflow processes data and performs automated tasks.

## Workflow Details
- **Total Nodes**: 40
- **Node Types**: 13
- **Error Handling**: ✅ Implemented
- **Security**: ✅ Hardened (no sensitive data)
- **Documentation**: ✅ Complete

## Node Breakdown
- **Bitrix24 Handler**: webhook
- **Extract Credentials**: set
- **Check Event Type**: code
- **Is Installation?**: if
- **Register Placement**: httpRequest
- **Process Settings**: function
- **Installation Response**: respondToWebhook
- **Has Valid Settings?**: if
- **Get Task Data**: httpRequest
- **Format Task Data**: function
- ... and 30 more nodes

## Usage Instructions
1. **Configure Credentials**: Set up all required API keys and credentials
2. **Update Variables**: Replace any placeholder values with actual data
3. **Test Workflow**: Run in test mode to verify functionality
4. **Deploy**: Activate the workflow for production use

## Security Notes
- All sensitive data has been removed or replaced with placeholders
- Error handling is implemented for reliability
- Follow security best practices when configuring credentials

## Troubleshooting
- Check error logs if workflow fails
- Verify all credentials are properly configured
- Ensure all required services are accessible
